A Souvenir of the Opera
Silchester, Hampshire Prizes - 1st £6 and cup, 2nd £4, 3rd £2. March contest - 1st South Berks, 2nd Tadley, 3rd Hook. Promoted by Silchester Silver Band. 4 bands competed.
Oct. 4, 2013, 7:36 a.m. Aug. 17, 2016, 8:30 a.m.
1 South Berkshire A. Yould
2 Tadley Band C. Baker
3 Goring and Streatley British Legion C. Baker
4 Hook and Odiham A. Brooker
